column4: also, why is  ubuntu the only open source distro that is commercializing?
meh, i kinda wished to see at least fedora or debian take the same path, without much community involvement, not much development either
distribution choice, there is nothing stopping the others from doing the same
yeah but it seems that the only reason why ubuntu is going forward is because the devs are now taking it as a fulltime job and it's paid with all those donations, shops, advertising
